name: Novocarbo
description: Novocarbo is all about Biochar Carbon Removal. The company was built by business professionals with a passion for soil & agriculture. Our origin lies in the fascination for biochar and its applications: selling, using and further developing biochar has been the backbone of our activities since 2018. Today we are proud to have leveraged our knowledge to the first scalable Carbon Removal solution on the European market and to play a leading role in the trading of Carbon Removal Certificates. We build and operate Carbon Removal Parks, where we produce high-quality biochar and generate climate-neutral energy. Our goal is to remove up to 1 million t of CO₂ from the atmosphere by 2030.
slogan: We permanently remove CO₂ from the atmosphere and create sustainable carbon-based products.
